tk_compound_mappings.note: Mapping of TK practices to active chemical compounds. Based on literature and traditional formulations.

metadata.source: Literature review + traditional formulations + cannabinoid/terpene profiles

TK_0000.name: Cannabis for chronic pain relief
TK_0000.notes: Full-spectrum pain relief: THC (analgesic), CBD (anti-inflammatory), β-caryophyllene (CB2 agonist), myrcene (sedative)

TK_0001.name: Cannabis oil for epilepsy
TK_0001.notes: CBD dominant for seizure control, CBG neuroprotective, linalool anxiolytic

TK_0002.name: Hemp seed for appetite stimulation
TK_0002.notes: THC primary appetite stimulant, myrcene enhances effect, limonene mood elevation

TK_0003.name: Cannabis topical for arthritis
TK_0003.notes: CBD anti-inflammatory, β-caryophyllene CB2 activation, THC local analgesic

TK_0004.name: Cannabis tea for anxiety
TK_0004.notes: CBD anxiolytic, linalool GABAergic, limonene mood elevation

TK_0005.name: Cannabis resin for migraine
TK_0005.notes: THC pain relief, CBD anti-inflammatory, pinene bronchodilator, β-caryophyllene CB2

TK_0007.name: Cannabis tincture for neuropathic pain
TK_0007.notes: Balanced cannabinoids for nerve pain, myrcene sedative, β-caryophyllene anti-inflammatory

TK_0008.name: Cannabis smoke for asthma
TK_0008.notes: THC bronchodilator, pinene anti-inflammatory respiratory, limonene expectorant

TK_0009.name: Hemp seed oil for skin conditions
TK_0009.notes: CBD anti-inflammatory skin, quercetin/resveratrol antioxidants for healing

TK_0010.name: Cannabis for glaucoma treatment
TK_0010.notes: THC reduces intraocular pressure, CBD neuroprotective, myrcene enhances effect

TK_0011.name: Cannabis compress for menstrual pain
TK_0011.notes: CBD/THC pain relief, linalool muscle relaxant, β-caryophyllene anti-inflammatory

TK_0012.name: Hemp protein for muscle recovery
TK_0012.notes: CBD anti-inflammatory recovery, β-caryophyllene CB2 activation, quercetin antioxidant

TK_0013.name: Cannabis for PTSD and trauma
TK_0013.notes: CBD anxiolytic/memory consolidation, low THC, linalool GABAergic, myrcene sedative

TK_0014.name: Cannabis for multiple sclerosis spasticity
TK_0014.notes: 1:1 THC:CBD for spasticity (Sativex model), β-caryophyllene anti-inflammatory, myrcene muscle relaxant

TK_0015.name: Hemp seed for constipation
TK_0015.notes: Fiber primary mechanism, CBD gut motility, quercetin anti-inflammatory bowel

TK_0016.name: Cannabis for nausea and vomiting
TK_0016.notes: THC primary antiemetic, CBD serotonin modulation, limonene gastric relief

TK_0017.name: Cannabis salve for burns
TK_0017.notes: CBD anti-inflammatory healing, β-caryophyllene pain, quercetin antioxidant, linalool antimicrobial

TK_0018.name: Cannabis for depression
TK_0018.notes: Low THC mood elevation, CBD anxiolytic, limonene antidepressant, pinene alertness

TK_0019.name: Hemp for hypertension
TK_0019.notes: CBD vasodilation, quercetin cardiovascular, myrcene sedative

TK_0020.name: Cannabis for Alzheimer's neuroprotection
TK_0020.notes: CBD neuroprotective/anti-inflammatory, THC amyloid reduction, pinene memory, β-caryophyllene CB2

TK_0021.notes: CBD blood sugar regulation, quercetin insulin sensitivity, myrcene anti-inflammatory

TK_0022.notes: CBD bone healing, CBG bone formation, β-caryophyllene anti-inflammatory

TK_0023.notes: THC antiemetic/appetite, CBD anti-inflammatory, limonene nausea, β-caryophyllene pain

TK_0024.name: Hemp root decoction for fever
